pros: -easy -relaxed -get to travel -free housing -get to live in apartment
cons: -management is slow to release information -things change last minute all the time -communication is very slow -you don’t stay with a host family in Croatia -honestly seems like anyone is accepted so weird people are attracted to it -when there’s issues during programming, management is slow to do anything about it if they do anything at all -you have to fundraise -not very proactive about problems

pros: can work with inspiring and motivated people to promote education abroad. Even if you're to an education major, it's a great experience for personal and professional growth and to meet new people.
cons: It's mostly student-run so the people/ staffers change every year which makes it a little hard for the organization to have robust structure as it depends on who is running position each year.

pros: -support, and orientation was helpful, wonderful experience
cons: -volunteer based, had to fund the experience yourself

review_title: I have worked at LEO for more than 3 years.
pros: Good working environment, Great Team work
cons: Outsourcing and everything that stems from it.
